title.native: 異世界はスマートフォンとともに。
title.romaji: Isekai wa Smartphone to Tomo ni.
title.english: In Another World With My Smartphone

description:
After a freak accident involving some lightning winds up zapping him dead, 15-year-old Mochizuki Touya wakes up to find himself face-to-face with God. “I am afraid to say that I have made a bit of a blunder...” laments the old coot. But all is not lost! God says that he can reincarnate Touya into a world of fantasy, and as a bonus, he gets to bring his smartphone along with! So begins Touya's adventure in a new, anachronistic pseudo-medieval world. Friends! Laughs! Tears! Inexplicable Deus ex Machina! He sets off on a journey full of wonder as he absentmindedly travels from place to place, following whatever goal catches his fancy. The curtains lift on an epic tale of swords, sorcery, and smartphone apps!

(Source: J-Novel Club)
synonyms: ไปต่างโลก! ก็ต้องไปกับสมาร์ทโฟนสิ!!!
帶著智慧型手機闖蕩異世界。

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Medieval
tags.description: Partially or completely set in the Middle Ages or a Middle Ages-inspired setting. Commonly features elements such as European castles and knights.

tags.name: Anachronism
tags.description: Prominently features elements that are out of place in the historical period the work takes place in, particularly modern elements in a historical setting.

tags.name: Twins
tags.description: Prominently features two or more siblings that were born at one birth.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Age Gap
tags.description: Prominently features romantic relations between people with a significant age difference.

tags.name: Marriage
tags.description: Centers around marriage between two or more characters.

tags.name: Afterlife
tags.description: Partly or completely set in the afterlife.

tags.name: Kemonomimi
tags.description: Prominently features humanoid characters with animal ears.

tags.name: Kuudere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who generally retains a cold, blunt and cynical exterior, but once one gets to know them, they have a very warm and loving interior.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Polyamorous
tags.description: Features a character who is in a consenting relationship with multiple people at one time.

name.native: ユミナ・エルネア・ベルファスト
スゥシィ・エルネア・オルトリンデ
アルマ ストランド

node.description:
__Date of Birth:__ 1976
__Place of Birth:__ Osaka Prefecture, Japan
__Doujin Circle:__ DO-RAKU7  

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/usatsukaeiji)

**Eiji Usatsuka** is a Japanese light novel illustrator. He is notable for the illustration for the series Zero no Tsukaima. He illustrates insert images for many novels.   

After university graduation he was employed as illustrator by the visual novel publisher Visual Art's using the pseudonym Sawagani (サワガニ, Japanese Freshwater Crab). As side job he made illustrations for light novels which is against the company policy. The similarity of "both peoples" designs, were however noticed and later revealed by Tōya Okano (scenario assistant for Visual Art's' Clannad) in a Dengeki G's Magazine interview article presenting Visual Art's brand Mana's game Angel Magister.  

 (Source: Wikipedia)

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/高橋ナツコ)

_Note: Not to be confused with the [animator](https://anilist.co/staff/193091/)._

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/高橋ナツコ)

_Note: Not to be confused with the [animator](https://anilist.co/staff/193091/)._

Tia Lynn Ballard is an American voice actress and ADR director affiliated with Funimation. Some of her notable roles are Zero Two from Darling in the Franxx, Kusano from Sekirei, Rin Ogata in Rideback.

The founder and former representative director of [Funimation](https://anilist.co/studio/102/).

**Non-anime roles:**
- Policeman in "Chuck E. Cheese in the Galaxy 5000"

__Cousin:__ [Aaron Dismuke](https://anilist.co/staff/95254/Aaron-Dismuke)

__Justin Ryan Cook__ is an American voice actor, producer, line producer, ADR director and enginner who works for FUNimation.

__Height:__ 174 cm (5'8.5")
__Hobbies:__ video games
__Agency:__ Atlas Talent

[Website](https://www.alejandrosaab.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/KaggyFilms) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/kaggyfilms/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/c/KaggyFilms/featured) | [Twitch](https://www.twitch.tv/kaggyfilms) | [Vtuber Twitter](https://twitter.com/CyYuVtuber) | [Vtuber Twitch](https://www.twitch.tv/cyyuvtuber) 

Alejandro Saab, also known as Kaggy in various social media platforms, is a professional voice actor and YouTube Influencer. While he enjoys playing various Dragon Ball games, making reaction videos, or other anime-related material on his twitch and youtube channel, he finds his true passion in voice acting. He has done work at many different studios like FUNimation Entertainment, Bang Zoom! Entertainment, Okratron 5000, RoosterTeeth, etc. for various anime and video games.

Alejandro debuted as a Vtuber on Twitch where he plays videogames and occasionally talks about Voice Over / Acting.

__Non-Anime Roles:__
~!Shallot (Dragon Ball Legends)
Yuri (Fire Emblem: Three Houses)
Professor Kukui (Pokemon Masters)
Roark (Pokemon Masters)
Leon (Pokemon Journeys: The Series)
Jules (Final Fantasy VII Remake)
Cyno (Genshin Impact)
Jing Yuan (Honkai: Star Rail)!
Akihiko Sanada (Persona 3 Reload)!~

[Twitter](https://x.com/Aaron__Dismuke)

Aaron is an American voice actor who works for anime series of Funimation Entertainment.  He started voice acting when he was nine years old as the voice of Hiro Sohma and the young Akito Sohma in Fruits Basket. He was only twelve years old when he voiced the role of Alphonse Elric in Fullmetal Alchemist, and is a cousin of voice actor and director Justin Cook. Aaron was one of few child voice actors in the voice acting field.  Due to his voice maturing, he was replaced by Maxey Whitehead for his role of Alphonse Elric in Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood, but makes a cameo as the voice of the young Van Hohenheim, Edward and Alphonse's father.
